author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Dumping for cmsShow needs a logical volume of unique name and copy number for  every positioning 

#### PR validation:

Tested with dumping the geometry as well as running the SIM step with the modified version

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

It is needed for the main branch only - no back porting needed
title: Run2-TB33 Enable test beam setup to dump geometry for cmsShow
